Works.title: How it works
Works.subTitle: Find out how to get started

cardText.first: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the Animarket by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
cardText.second: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.
cardText.third: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.

ConnectAWallet.subTitle: Choose a wallet you want to connect. There are several wallet providers.
